sentences.sContent: So there are two other models, then, models different from the immigration model, two other models for understanding the formation of Israel, that build on this archaeological evidence.
sentences.sContent_eng: So there are two other models, then, models different from the immigration model, two other models for understanding the formation of Israel, that build on this archaeological evidence.
sentences.sCn: 那么还有两个其他的模型，与移民模型不同的两个模型，这两个模型也是为了说明以色列的形成，它们是依据考古学证据。

sentences.sContent: In particular, he said they had been influenced by the discovery of a crucified skeleton, which was found near Jerusalem in 1968 and is the only such archaeological find.
sentences.sContent_eng: In particular, he said they had been influenced by the discovery of a crucified skeleton, which was found near Jerusalem in 1968 and is the only such archaeological find.
sentences.sCn: 他特别指出他们受到一具被钉死的骨架的影响，这具骨架在1968年出土于耶路撒冷附近，并且是这方面唯一的考古学发现。

trans.tranCn: [古] 考古学的；[古] 考古学上的
